title: NO-FEE Incredible Hudson Yards 1 Bed with Laundry in Unit!
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Sabrina RosalPhone: 201-350-7865Email: srosal@kw.comThis no-fee, beautiful 1 bed 1 bath offers condo-level finishes, a gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, a spa-like bathroom with Italian porcelain tiling, oak wood flooring, chrome fixtures, oversized windows, individually controlled heat & air, and an in-home washer & dryer. This luxury building offers a 24-hour doorman, expansive solarium and sky lounge with private cabanas, squash court, fitness center, co-working spaces, golf simulator, pet washing room, bike & resident storage, valet services, and Caffe Vento on site. Conveniently located near the 7/A/C/E/ W 39th St Ferry. * Listed rent is net effective rent, based on a gross rent of $5730.00 and 1.5 Months Free LISTING #138517 Building AmenitiesDoormanElevatorHealth ClubSubwayLaundryBicycle RoomStorageRoof DeckWheelchair AccessReceiving Room Apartment AmenitiesDishwasherHardwoodLightNO FEELaundry In UnitStainless Steel Appliances Sabrina RosalPhone: 201-350-7865Email: srosal@kw.com To view, call or text Sabrina Rosal at:201-350-7865Email: srosal@kw.com
